entry.title: Ubuntu 12.04下面無線網路無法ifconfig Wlan0 Up的檢查
entry.content:
錯誤訊息

$ifconfig wlan0 up
SIOCSIFFLAGS: Operation not possible due to RF-kill

解決方式

  • 列出RF的block狀態，如果是硬體關掉請自行打開RF開關
    • rfkill list all
$ rfkill list all
8: phy1: Wireless LAN
    Soft blocked: yes
    Hard blocked: yes
9: hci0: Bluetooth
    Soft blocked: yes
    Hard blocked: no
  • 從軟體上面打開WIFI
    • rfkill unblock wifi
